mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_name, parent_id,ancestors,order_num, url, menu_type, visible, perms, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from adv_menu
and parent_id = #{parentId}
SELECT count(*) FROM adv_menu WHERE menu_name = #{menuName};
select IFNULL(MAX(order_num),0) from adv_menu where parent_id = #{parentId};
mapper.insert: insert into adv_menu (menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, url, menu_type, visible, perms, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{visible,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysdate(),jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update adv_menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR},
visible = #{visible,jdbcType=CHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = sysdate(),
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update adv_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=CHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = sysdate(), remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
